titleStmt.title: Whereas this city and liberties thereof, and especially the street of Cornhill and passages about the Royal Exchange, and coffee-houses, are much pestered with a sort of loose and idle people called hawkers ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Pritchard, William, Sir, 1632?-1705.

notesStmt.note: Title from first four lines of text.
At head of title: Pritchard mayor. Martis vicesimo primo die Novermbr', 1682. Annoque regni Regis Caroli Secundi, Angl', &c. xxxiv.̊
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
